title: The Bachelorette, Angie Kent: Two men get into a FIGHT at the cocktail party
text:
With 18 suitors vying for Angie Kent's heart, this year's season of The Bachelorette will feature more testosterone than ever before.

And according to Woman's Day, a fight breaks out during the first episode after two men start throwing punches at the cocktail party.

'[The party had] barely begun when two of the contenders get into a physical fight,' a source told the publication.

Bombshell! A fight reportedly breaks out during the first episode of The Bachelorette after two men start throwing punches at the cocktail party. Pictured: Angie Kent

The situation apparently gets so heated that several other contestants have to jump in and pull the men apart.

Furthermore, as a result of the tension in the house, one bachelor reaches breaking point and decides to quit early.

'He just stormed off crying… everyone turned on him,' the source added.

Drama! The situation apparently gets so heated that several other contestants have to jump in and pull the men apart

It comes after Angie made an eyebrow-raising joke about her bachelors on Friday, telling 10 Daily that some of them could be using performance-enhancing drugs.

She compared The Bachelorette to 'dating on steroids', before saying: ' The dudes aren't on steroids, it's just dating on steroids... I mean, they could be. I don't know.'

Angie added that she was 'frightened' of having her heart broken, but was prepared to take the risk in a bid to find lasting love.

'They could be on steroids!' It comes after Angie made an eyebrow-raising joke about her bachelors on Friday, telling 10 Daily that some of them could be using performance-enhancing drugs. Pictured: Angie and the cast of The Bachelorette

'I'm putting myself in that position, really for the first time, to have my heart broken. I think it's worth it because the love you feel... does outweigh the risk,' she said.

Before being cast as The Bachelorette, Angie was famous for her appearances on Gogglebox and I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday, October 9 at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: With 18 suitors vying for Angie Kent's heart, this year's season of The Bachelorette will feature more testosterone than ever before.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
